scripts.publish-extension: npm run release && jszip-cli add --noconfig --force -o built/Release/Firefox/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons-Source.zip src LICENSE manifest.json package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json webpack.config.js release/README.md
scripts.release: webpack --mode=production && mkdirp built/Release/Firefox/ && rimraf built/Release/Firefox/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.xpi && jszip-cli add --noconfig --force -o built/Release/Firefox/Crunchyroll-With-Better-Seasons.xpi built/Firefox/src built/Firefox/LICENSE built/Firefox/manifest.json
